key_risks: Cord-cutting trend impacting traditional cable TV revenue
Intense competition from larger media conglomerates
Dependency on flagship shows for viewership and revenue
Volatility in advertising revenue due to economic downturns and shifting viewer habits
Production delays from COVID-19 affecting content availability
